hadiths.text: Hushaim narrated from Dawud, from Abu Az-Zubair, from Jabir, who said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Umra is permissible for the one to whom it is given, and Ruqba is permissible for the one to whom it is given

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ جَابِرٍ فِي الْعُمْرَى
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Versions Of The Report Of Jabir Concerning 'Umra
